components.name: Testing Infrastructure
components.description: Tracks issues with tests and testing infrastructure.

fields.description:
Noticed this after merging the patch.

Can you take care of this ?

Also, can you run it on a smaller data set ? - the output is just too big.

How can I control this value?
Lookes like whether we do "ant package" before "ant test" makes a difference in numRows?
